channel.title: Alumni Quotes on Firetower Project
channel.description: Recent content in Alumni Quotes on Firetower Project

item.title: Franklin
item.description: The miles on my soul I share with each of you; they speak a language few of us understand.

item.title: Deal
item.description: I carry the miles and memories of AppState XC with pride, and lean on the lessons learned daily. By contributing to the Firetower Project, I’m honored to support the future sucess of mountaineer runners.

item.title: Mitchell
item.description: As members of the team, we all looked to help take the team to a higher level from when we started. The Firetower Project presents us with the opportunity to help perpetuate the program’s success after we have graduated.

item.title: Hollis
item.description: The time is right to take on the goal of elevating the AppState Men’s Cross Country program back to the national stage.

item.title: Evans
item.description: When I heard about the Firetower Project, I knew I had to get involved. It will take many different talents across our wide alumni base to achieve the mission, but I’m looking forward to the challenge. Let’s do this!

item.title: Slagle
item.description: I recognize the impact that Appalachian State Cross Country has had on my life. I’m looking forward to this stalwart opportunity to contribute back to the program with other alumni.
